passwordRules.help: Password must contain at least 8 characters, one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
passwordRules.minLengthError: Password must contain at least {length} characters
passwordRules.uppercaseError: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordRules.lowercaseError: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordRules.numberError: Password must contain at least one number
passwordRules.specialError: Password must contain at least one special character
